SEARCH
Package BackEndUtility

Class Catalog

java.lang.Object
BackEndUtility.Catalog
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Catalog extends Object implements Serializable
The Catalog class represents a catalog of products and sellers in UniShop. It organizes products into different categories and provides various functionalities for displaying, filtering, and ordering products and sellers.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Catalog

      public Catalog(ArrayList<Seller> sellers)
      Constructs a catalog with the given list of sellers. Populates the catalog with products from each seller based on their category.
      Parameters:
      sellers - List of sellers to initialize the catalog with.

  • Method Details

    • getCatalogType

      public HashSet<Product> getCatalogType(Category category)
      Returns the set of products for a specific category.
      Parameters:
      category - The category of products to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A HashSet of products belonging to the specified category.

    • displayCatalog

      public void displayCatalog()
      Displays the entire catalog organized by categories, and prints the list of sellers.

    • filterProductsByCategory

      public void filterProductsByCategory(Category category)
      Filters and prints products in the catalog based on the specified category.
      Parameters:
      category - The category by which products will be filtered and displayed.

    • searchProductByName

      public Product searchProductByName(String title)
      Searches for a product in the catalog by its title.
      Parameters:
      title - The title of the product to search for.
      Returns:
      The information for the found product or null if there is no matching product.

    • orderProducts

      public void orderProducts(boolean ascending, String filter)
      Orders and prints products in the catalog based on the specified sorting criteria.
      Parameters:
      ascending - Indicates if the sorting should be in ascending order or not.
      filter - The criteria by which products will be ordered ("price", "likes", or "averageNote").

    • filterSellersByCategory

      public void filterSellersByCategory(Category category)
      Filters sellers in the catalog based on the specified category and prints the ones that meet the criteria.
      Parameters:
      category - The category by which sellers will be filtered and displayed.

    • filterSellersByFollowing

      public void filterSellersByFollowing(Buyer user)
      Filters and prints sellers in the catalog based on the sellers followed by a specific buyer.
      Parameters:
      user - The buyer for whom to display the sellers they are following.

    • orderSellers

      public void orderSellers(boolean ascending, String filter)
      Orders and prints sellers in the catalog based on the specified sorting criteria.
      Parameters:
      ascending - Indicates whether the sorting should be in ascending order.
      filter - The criteria by which sellers will be ordered ("likes" or "averageNote").
